amendment.description: Amendment appropriates $4.4 million for the Office of Advocacy at the Small Business Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 24, as amendment No. 26, to provide $4.4 million for the Office of Advocacy at the Small Business Administration; and offsets this increase by cutting by $4.4 million the salaries and expenses and administrative expenses for the direct and guaranteed loan program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meyers amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. LaFalce demanded a separate vote on the Meyers amendment (A031).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meyers amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 368 - 57 (Roll no. 584).
